author: Jon Sharman, Jon Sharman
title: Coronavirus in numbers as confirmed cases reach 1 million
description: Some are frightening, others inspiring. Together these figures depict people doing their best to fight a menace that is still growing, writes Jon Sharman
content: Twenty-two days after the World Health Organisation declared coronavirus a pandemic, the number of confirmed cases has reached 1 million. The US has seen the most infections, with more than 200,000, and more officially-acknowledged deaths than China, where th… [+13921 chars]
